The night falls in a heavy, suffocating cloak, entwined are we. The emotion for which you lust flares once, then dies, devoured by the all-encompassing dark. All hope must sicken and die. Your passion throbs no more. How could you cause such hurt? Demons surround us, crying, We are Fallen.

I really don't get you right now, you tried everything you could think of to get at me, yet i give you one thing to do and you back down , aim for another target . I don't get you anymore, Are you crazy !? Because right now this is no way of going about getting me to have some kind of feelings for you anymore. I was seriously thinking you know, maybe just maybe things could work , but you blew it all, and you know what, i'm not going to let myself be set up, just so that you can drag me down , again! This is it, never again. I'm gone.

I search across the miles, And wonder if you're out there. If you can hear me.. Or feel these feelings I have. Can you see how much i've missed you? Does it even matter anymore? Sometimes I just wish you'd die So my life could be clear. So I could go about my life Day to day, Full of bliss, and peace. But, You've consumed me too much. And too far inside. The worms of your lies, pain... Eat me up inside. There's no cure for the disease you've given to me. Maybe someday....I'll finally be free.
